texto: assessment to support the assessors’ judgement in rating process attributes; 9 ISO/IEC TR 15504-1:1998(E) © ISO/IEC c) evidence based on the indicators that supports the assessors’ judgment of process attribute ratings must be recorded and maintained. The simplest way in which these requirements can be met is for the elements of the compatible model - including the indicators - to be embedded in an appropriate instrument or tool, that permits the recording of observations and evidence throughout the assessment. ISO/IEC TR 15504-4 contains guidance on the selection and use of assessment instruments and tools.
